ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:1.2_0: the nuns were giving the full admission to married girls less than twelve years old.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:1.3_0: They were ignorant and incompetent, and did not know what was allowable and what was not.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:1.4_0: And their students too were ignorant and incompetent,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:1.5_0: and they did not know what was allowable and what was not.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:1.7_0: “How can nuns who have less than twelve years of seniority give the full admission?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:1.13_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:1.14.1_0: ‘If a nun who has less than twelve years of seniority gives the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:2.1.5_0: Who is less than twelve years old:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:2.1.6_0: who has not reached twelve years of age.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:2.1.9_0: If, intending to give full admission, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastic boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:2.1.10_0: After the motion, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:2.1.11_0: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:2.1.12_0: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:2.1.13_0: and the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:2.2.2_0: if one who has twelve years of seniority gives the full admission;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:2.2.4_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc74:2.2.5_0: The fourth training rule is finished.
